svg.source:
Title : Game flow (human rocks)
No.of round is 1
Participant selecting drawing word before word selection timer elapses
Participant providing correct answer before drawing timer elapses
participant Participant_1 as p1 participant Server as server participant Participant_2 as p2 participant DB as db participant Scheduler as scheduler p1 --> server : connect p2 --> server : connect p1 --> server : create game p2 --> server : join game p1 --> server : start game server -> db : update game records server -> db : assign roles server -> scheduler : schedule task to auto select drawing word (w1) #note right of scheduler : schedule task to
force select the word
after 'x' seconds server -> db : map & persist 'w1' task id with game id server -> p1 : game ready server -> p2 : game ready p1 --> server : get game state p2 --> server : get game state server -> p1 : user role as 'drawer' server -> p2 : user role as 'viewer' p1 --> server : get list of words p1 --> server : select a word server -> db : map & persist selected word with game id server -> db : invalidate 'w1' task server -> p1 : start drawing server -> scheduler : schedule task to auto end current drawing session (d1) server -> p2 : hint about the word p2 --> server : answer server -> p2 : wrong answer p2 --> server : answer server -> p2 : correct answer server -> db : invalidate 'd1' task if all participant answered correctly server -> p1 : show score board server -> p2 : show score board server -> db : assign roles server -> scheduler : schedule task to auto select drawing word (w2) server -> db : map & persist 'w2' task id with game id server -> p1 : user role as 'viewer' server -> p2 : user role as 'drawer' p2 --> server : get list of words p2 --> server : select a word server -> db : map & persist selected word with game id server -> db : invalidate 'w2' task server -> p2 : start drawing server -> scheduler : schedule task to auto end current drawing session (d2) server -> p1 : hint about the word p1 --> server : answer server -> p1 : correct answer server -> db : invalidate 'd2' task if all participant answered correctly server -> p1 : show final score board server -> p2 : show final score board
svg.desc: Game flow (human rocks) No.of round is 1 Participant selecting drawing word before word selection timer elapses Participant providing correct answer before drawing timer elapses

text.tspan: Participant selecting drawing word before word selection timer elapses
Participant providing correct answer before drawing timer elapses
schedule task to auto select drawing word (w1)
map & persist 'w1' task id with game id
map & persist selected word with game id
schedule task to auto end current drawing session (d1)
invalidate 'd1' task if all participant answered correctly
schedule task to auto select drawing word (w2)
map & persist 'w2' task id with game id
map & persist selected word with game id
schedule task to auto end current drawing session (d2)
invalidate 'd2' task if all participant answered correctly
